"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":" rampaging all over your house"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"这个短语意思是到处乱跑、胡闹或搞破坏，通常形容动物或小孩子在房子里无拘无束、无序地活动。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：Our dog was rampaging all over the house, knocking over lamps and chewing on the furniture."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":" that was always the snag"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"这个短语表示某个持续存在的问题或障碍。通常指某件事总有一个难以解决的地方。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：
"We tried various solutions to fix the engine, but that was always the snag—finding the right replacement part was nearly impossible.""}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":" Success breeds envy as ever"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"这句话的意思是成功总会引起嫉妒，不论何时何地。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：When she received the promotion at work, she noticed that success breeds envy as ever among some of her colleagues."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":" reach the limit"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":""达到极限"是指一个人、物体或系统已经到达其能力、效能或耐久力的最大值，无法再超越或承受更多。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：
After working non-stop for three days, she felt that she had finally reached her limit."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":[" more natrually ",{"type":"b","key":null,"props":{"children":"inquisitive"}}," than man"]}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"“更自然地拥有好奇心”是指在特定环境或情境下某物或生物比人类更本能地展现出好奇和探索的行为。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"例句：Cats often appear more naturally inquisitive than humans; they explore every nook and cranny with intense curiosity."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":" good man at heart"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"中文解释：这个短语通常用来形容一个人在内心深处是善良的，即使他的行为或表现可能不是总是这样。它强调一个人的内在美德和善良特质。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：Despite his rough exterior, everyone knew he was a good man at heart."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":" compulsively unfaithful"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"“compulsively unfaithful”指的是一个人无法控制地持续对伴侣不忠，这种行为可能达到强迫性的程度，就像一种难以克制的冲动。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：Despite being in a loving relationship, he found himself compulsively unfaithful, unable to resist the temptation to cheat repeatedly."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":[" Not firing at anyone, just to ",{"type":"b","key":null,"props":{"children":"let off steam"}}]}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"“发泄情绪”或“释放压力”的意思。指通过某种方式来舒缓自己的压力或释放情绪，而不是针对某个人。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：After a stressful day at work, she went for a run to let off steam."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":" Round about midnight, I broke down"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"这个短语讲述了一个人在接近午夜时分情绪崩溃或失控的情况。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句: "Round about midnight, I broke down and couldn't stop crying as all the stress overwhelmed me.""}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":" play safe"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":""Play safe" 的中文意思是采取谨慎的方式以避免风险或麻烦。在某些情况下，它指的是选择保护自己和他人利益的行动。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：It's best to play safe and double-check your calculations before submitting the report."}},"
"]}},{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":" to have everything out in the open"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"短语“to have everything out in the open”指的是将所有信息、情况或想法公开透明地展示出来，没有任何隐瞒或保留。"}},"
",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英语例句：
"In order to resolve the conflict, it's important to have everything out in the open so that we can address all concerns honestly.""}},"
"]}}]}},{"type":"audio","key":null,"props":{"className":"py-3 mt-5","src":"https://github.com/YuantianDing/yuantianding.github.io/raw/refs/heads/main/en/src/pages/notes/shadowlands/_allnotes.mp3","controls":true}}]}}]}}
